text: Niscaya yisakale amara ayatasamuhaka bikrta karae, sihamta mora agocarata nahaya. (Koraacona) ‘yijana agnita niksipta ha’ba si sraestha ne yijana kiyamatara dina niraapade upasthita ha’ba te'om’? Tomaloke yi iccha amala karaa. Tomaloke yi amalake nakaraa kiya, niscaya te'om tara samyaka drasta
